comments:
Build ID: org.eclipse.cdt.core_4.0.1.200709190101.jar

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Use CDT Parser as standalone C++ Parser
2. Declare in a header something like
class xy {
...  
template<typename T>
const T& get() const;
};
3. Attempt to access the class owner of CPPASTFunctionDefinition using the binding like this
...
((ICPPMember) binding).getClassOwner().getQualifiedName()
...
4. Class CPPMethodTemplate representing the binding for  this particular case casts to (CPPClassScope) although scope is of type ICPPTemplateScope


More information:
[java] java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPTemplateScope
[java] 	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPMethodTemplate.getClassOwner(CPPMethodTemplate.java:129)
[java] 	at ...
